ingredients.item: 200g pack Waitrose Pome Dei Moro Tomatoes, quartered

instructions.step: Heat a medium non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Melt the butter from the pack of potatoes and fry the potatoes and salad onions for 3 minutes. Preheat the grill to high.

Beat the eggs with half the basil and season. Pour into the pan and cook for 5-7 minutes. Nestle the peppers on top then grill for 5 minutes until golden. Mix the tomatoes, remaining basil and seasoning then spoon over the omelette.
